data.name: A Crown of Thorns
data.detailed_description:
This is a visual novel based on the IP of the 3 time award nominated feature film script entitled “Blade n Blood”– A Post Apocalyptic world that is a cross between Sin City and Blade Runner. It has been nominated 3 times for Best Sci Fi Feature Script at very large and respected film festivals. The film is currently being developed. This is the first of a trilogy of adult visual novels that take place about 25 years before the feature. It is the Story of Sebastian Luscious, the Great Grand Son of the Founder of the order of Jerusalem Knights and the victors of the War of Thorns. It is the road of his perdition and fall.

A Crown of Thorns is an adult choice driven visual novel game. It is our first foray into game creation and we hope you enjoy the journey as we learn and expound on our vision as we grow. If you are interested in StormCrow Productions and want to support not only our vision with our games but also our feature films please join our Patreon and get sneak peaks on excerpts from feature film scripts and the upcoming game series. (Found on following news alert). This game was created by the very talented JD Glasscock, someone who has been writing for 3 decades starting as a singer/songwriter and slam poet in 1990 and has won numerous awards at film festivals around the country and has been an avid gamer for his entire life. He is also the writer/director behind Blade n Blood. We hired Cursebox Game Studios, a young up and coming game studio, to bring his vision to reality. We are on a tight budget on the first game but have striven to balance this out with a cinematic journey worthy of the World it’s based on. Join us for the foray into the lecherous City of Blood. This is Book One of a Three Book Series. The other two books will be sold separately. Be a part of the growing world that will eventually end in the feature film being released.

The game graphically depicts sex, usage of drugs and violence. The story is not intended for players being in a dark period of their lives. If you are easily offended or just looking for a fun game only, this game is not for you.
All sexual acts in the game are consensual. - StormCrow Productions




Sebastian Luscious – Twenty years old. Great Grand Son of Elias Luscious (Also called the Blood Knight, now deceased) the founder of the Knights of Thorns now called The Jerusalem Knights and Founder of the City State – New Jerusalem. He has been trained since birth as a warrior and carries a large iron stave (as tall as himself) in shape of a cross that can be used as a weapon.


Idealus Luscious – Fifty Years old. High Lord General of New Jerusalem, Sebastian’s Father and next in line to become The Precept of New Jerusalem with the passing of his Father. He is a hard man that unlike his father believes that they are mandated holy men who have no need of honor or restraint. He regularly fucks Sisters of the Heavenly Choir who serve the Jerusalem Knights. He is harsh and violent towards his son and demands total obedience.


Rodian Godiva – New CEO and Ruler of the Godiva Corporation – 30 Years old. He is ruthless and by far the youngest Ceo of all the Mega Corps. Many think he had a hand in his father’s demise. He rules the City of Blood and holds the Designs to the Crown of Thorns that the Jerusalem Knights so covet. He has his scientists utilizing the design to make new derivative battle drug called Thrash which he believes will allow him to rule the world once it is perfected. He thinks of himself as an Emperor though as have yet to call himself such. He is very debaucherous and known for his wild orgies and violence.


Anastacia – 20 Year old slender beautiful woman and a Warrior of the Crone Shadow who was tasked in keeping Sebastian alive, at least for now. She is the daughter of Synara and younger sister to The Spider. She is highly gifted in the power of the Crone Shadow and uses flirtation and her sexuality as a weapon.


Senior Sister Avala – She is in charge of The New Jerusalem Embassy and also assigned as the body guard and liason of Sebastian when he comes to the City of Blood. She has been trained in combat since she was young and is one of the rare hidden group of Sisters of the Heavenly Choir called The Iron Sisters – warriors. She is also instructed to fuck Sebastian if he so desires. She was the first of the Iron Sisters and trained directly under the Reverend Mother, and true in strength and spirit.

Helena – Rodian’s Mistress age 24 and a hedonist who matches Rodian in his debauchery and violence. She is always first in line to join his orgies and holds more authority then it would seem.

data.short_description: A Cyberpunk visual novel in a post Apocalyptic world that is a cross between Sin City and Blade Runner. Based on the IP of the 3 time award nominated feature film script entitled “Blade n Blood” .

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: A modern medium game laptop should run this without problems.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.5Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: A modern medium game laptop should run this without problems.

content_descriptors.notes: Its a mature drama, akin to Game of Thrones. Violence and political conspiracy.
